verses.text_ar: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Qaf. By the Glorious Qur´an,

verses.text_ar: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Nay, but they marvel that a warner of their own hath come unto them; and the disbelievers say: This is a strange thing:

verses.text_ar: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When we are dead and have become dust (shall we be brought back again)? That would be a far return!

verses.text_ar: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We know that which the earth taketh of them, and with Us is a recording Book.

verses.text_ar: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Nay, but they have denied the truth when it came unto them, therefor they are now in troubled case.

verses.text_ar: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Have they not then observed the sky above them, how We have constructed it and beautified it, and how there are no rifts therein?

verses.text_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the earth have We spread out, and have flung firm hills therein, and have caused of every lovely kind to grow thereon,

verses.text_ar: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A vision and a reminder for every penitent slave.

verses.text_ar: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We send down from the sky blessed water whereby We give growth unto gardens and the grain of crops,

verses.text_ar: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And lofty date-palms with ranged clusters,

verses.text_ar: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Provision (made) for men; and therewith We quicken a dead land. Even so will be the resurrection of the dead.

verses.text_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The folk of Noah denied (the truth) before them, and (so did) the dwellers at Ar-Rass and (the tribe of) Thamud,

verses.text_ar: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And (the tribe of) A´ad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot,

verses.text_ar: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the dwellers in the wood, and the folk of Tubb´a: every one denied their messengers, therefor My threat took effect.

verses.text_ar: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Were We then worn out by the first creation? Yet they are in doubt about a new creation.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We verily created man and We know what his soul whispereth to him, and We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.

verses.text_ar: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When the two Receivers receive (him), seated on the right hand and on the left,

verses.text_ar: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He uttereth no word but there is with him an observer ready.

verses.text_ar: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the agony of death cometh in truth. (And it is said unto him): This is that which thou wast wont to shun.

verses.text_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the trumpet is blown. This is the threatened Day.

verses.text_ar: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And every soul cometh, along with it a driver and a witness.

verses.text_ar: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And unto the evil-doer it is said): Thou wast in heedlessness of this. Now We have removed from thee thy covering, and piercing is thy sight this day.

verses.text_ar: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And (unto the evil-doer) his comrade saith: This is that which I have ready (as testimony).

verses.text_ar: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it is said): Do ye twain hurl to hell each rebel ingrate,

verses.text_ar: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hinderer of good, transgressor, doubter,

verses.text_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Who setteth up another god along with Allah. Do ye twain hurl him to the dreadful doom.

verses.text_ar: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: His comrade saith: Our Lord! I did not cause him to rebel, but he was (himself) far gone in error.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He saith: Contend not in My presence, when I had already proffered unto you the warning.

verses.text_ar: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The sentence that cometh from Me cannot be changed, and I am in no wise a tyrant unto the slaves.

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: On the day when We say unto hell: Art thou filled? and it saith: Can there be more to come?

verses.text_ar: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the Garden is brought nigh for those who kept from evil, no longer distant.

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it is said): This is that which ye were promised. (It is) for every penitent and heedful one,

verses.text_ar: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Who feareth the Beneficent in secret and cometh with a contrite heart.

verses.text_ar: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Enter it in peace. This is the day of immortality.

verses.text_ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: There they have all that they desire, and there is more with Us.

verses.text_ar: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And how many a generation We destroyed before them, who were mightier than these in prowess so that they overran the lands! Had they any place of refuge (when the judgment came)?

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! therein verily is a reminder for him who hath a heart, or giveth ear with full intelligence.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And verily We created the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in six Days, and naught of weariness touched Us.

verses.text_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Therefor (O Muhammad) bear with what they say, and hymn the praise of thy Lord before the rising and before the setting of the sun;

verses.text_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in the night-time hymn His praise, and after the (prescribed) prostrations.

verses.text_ar: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And listen on the day when the crier crieth from a near place,

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The day when they will hear the (Awful) Cry in truth. That is the day of coming forth (from the graves).

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We it is Who quicken and give death, and unto Us is the journeying.

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: On the day when the earth splitteth asunder from them, hastening forth (they come). That is a gathering easy for Us (to make).

verses.text_ar: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We are Best Aware of what they say, and thou (O Muhammad) art in no wise a compeller over them. But warn by the Qur´an him who feareth My threat.
